parallel

Interface BufferIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundedBuffer, BoundedBufferArray, BoundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized, UnboundedBufferArray, UnboundedBufferArrayUnsynchronized

    public interface BufferIntf
    Interface for classes that implement bounded or unbounded, synchronized or unsynchronized buffers operating in FIFO order.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addElement(java.lang.Object o)
      adds an element at the end of this buffer.
      java.lang.Object elementAt(int pos)
      return the element at position pos.
      java.lang.Object remove()
      removes the "oldest" element in this buffer and returns it to the caller.
      void reset()
      reset this buffer.
      int size()
      return the current number of objects in this buffer.

    • Method Detail

         throws java.lang.Exception
        adds an element at the end of this buffer.
        Parameters:
        o - Object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if this is an unsynchronized bounded buffer and it is full
